Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but considering its importance to you, we believe it's time to explore a mutually beneficial arrangement. We propose to offer the product to you at a special price of $950000. This figure reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also acknowledges the substantial benefit it would bring to you. We are confident that this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties and look forward to discussing further details with you. Should you require any additional information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We hope to hear from you soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
